title: 5-Minute Marketing for Authors: Get More Sales for Your Books in Just 5 Minutes a Day
description: Spend just 5 minutes a day promoting your books to bestseller status!Are you a published author looking to promote your book or books?Are you hoping to publish a book soon and wondering how you are going to promote your new book?Do you have a "day job" and not enough time to promote your books, even though you want your books to become your "day job"?If you have books to promote and no time, this book can help. Inside you will an explanation of book promotion strategies that can take only 5 minutes a day to perform- a list of "to do" items that are recommended to be completed before you start the 5-minute marketing plan- a 90-day marketing plan for your book that only takes 5 minutes a day to complete, and- a customizable Word template so that you can create your own 90-day, 5-minute marketing plan!Scroll up to download your copy today and sell more books in just 5 minutes a day!
author: Barb Asselin
